apis.name: List all feature flag user lists for a project
apis.description: Gets all feature flag user lists for the requested project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: search
attributes.description: Return user lists matching the search criteria.

apis.name: Create a feature flag user list
apis.description: Creates a feature flag user list.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the feature flag.

attributes.name: user_xids
attributes.description: A comma-separated list of user IDs.

apis.description: Gets a feature flag user list.

attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: iid
attributes.description: The internal ID of the project’s feature flag user list.
